A former Coronation Street star has shown off his incredible body transformation 
Scott Wright, who appeared on the soap between 2000 - 2002, has turned himself from being classified as obese to having a healthy body in just 12 weeks. 
The actor followed a strict diet and exercise regime, and managed to transform himself into a muscled hunk. 
Scott, who previously won Rear of the Year, posed for incredible before and after shots that prove just how much weight he managed to shift. Scott's showed off his amazing transformation (Photo: Tony Craig) He did it in just three months (Photo: Tony Craig) 
His weight issues began when he was asked to put on a stone and a half for a film role. 
Scott, 42, said: “I looked terrible before I lost the weight – I was in shocking shape I had very little energy and completely ashamed of my man boobs and ever expanding waist line. 
“I was only supposed to put on a stone-and-a-half but I totally lost all my discipline and put on two-and-a-half stone." Scott once famously stripped on the soap (Photo: Granada Television) Read More 
Realising he needed to change his ways, Scott embarked on a weight loss journey and managed to lose a massive 35lbs in just three months. 
Even more impressively, his waist measurement shrunk over 10 inches in total. The actor changed his lifestyle completely (Photo: Tony Craig) He never wants to go back to how he was (Photo: Tony Craig) 
He explained: “I had always had a keen interest in fitness and always tried to look after my body, to the extent that ten years ago I took a break from acting and set up a gym and personal training business. 
He teamed up with experts from Forza Supplements, who set him out a low-sugar, low carb diet and exercise regime. 
“I’m 42 now, so it’s ten times harder to get fit and reduce body fat than it was when I was 20, but I feeI that I have achieved all my goals," he added. Like us on Facebook
